title: No popup menu on Java editor ruler in Photon
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu appears when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor in Photon.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc. However, no popup menu appears.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc. However, currently, no popup menu appears.
SR: 1) Launch Photon. 2) Open a Java editor. 3) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. Verify that no popup menu appears, preventing the user from adding breakpoints, marks, etc.
